data.title: Beyonce Net Worth, Age, Kids, Biography, Husband & Family
data.meta_description: Beyonce is a Famous Singer, Songwriter, Actress And Businesswoman in American. Here, know more about Beyonce's career, age, family, pics, biography & more.
data.text:
Beyonce’s biography is a tale of talent, hard work, and success. Born Beyonce Giselle Knowles on September 4, 1981, in Houston, Texas, she rose to fame as the lead singer of Destiny’s Child. Beyonce’s solo career took off with her debut album, Dangerously in Love, and she has since released several critically acclaimed albums. Beyonce’s biography is a testament to her talent and her impact on the music industry.

Beyonce Net Worth

Beyonce’s net worth is estimated to be around $800 million. This impressive net worth comes from her successful career as a solo artist, her time with Destiny’s Child, and various business ventures Beyonce’s net worth is a testament to her incredible talent and business acumen.

Beyonce Age

Beyonce age is 42 years old, born on September 4, 1981. Despite Beyonce age, she continues to dominate the music industry, proving that age is just a number when it comes to talent and success.

Beyonce Kids

Beyonce kids are Blue Ivy, and twins Rumi and Sir. Beyonce’s kids, especially Blue Ivy, have already started making their own mark in the entertainment industry.

What is the age of Beyonce?

Beyonce age is 43 Years, her date of birth Sep 04, 1981, horoscope Virgo, place of birth Houston, Texas, United States, nationality as American and residence California, United States.

What is the Profession of Beyonce?

Beyonce is an American Singer, Songwriter, Actress And Businesswoman by profession.

Who is Beyonce's husband?

Beyonce husband or spouse name is Jay-Z.

Who is Beyonce's Parents?

Beyonce father name is Mathew Knowles and mother name Tina Knowles.

Who is Beyonce's siblings?

Beyonce siblings name is Bianca Lawson, Solange Knowles, Nixon Knowles.

What is the net worth of Beyonce?

Beyonce net worth is $800 million.

What is Beyonce education?

Beyonce education is High School.

What is the height of Beyonce?

Beyonce height is 5 feet 7 inches.

What is the weight of Beyonce?

Beyonce weight 62 kg.
